title: Inman Park Adventure
shortDescription: Explore the charm and history of Inman Park with this engaging scavenger hunt!
fullDescription: This scavenger hunt will guide you through the historic Inman Park neighborhood, highlighting its stunning architecture, lush parks, and vibrant local spots. Perfect for a fun and educational outing!

missions.title: Trolley Barn
missions.shortDescription: Start your journey at the historic Trolley Barn.
missions.hint: Look for a building that once housed Atlanta's electric streetcars.

missions.title: Inman Park Butterfly Garden
missions.shortDescription: Visit the enchanting butterfly garden, a symbol of the neighborhood.
missions.hint: Find the garden with vibrant flowers and a butterfly sculpture.

missions.title: Krog Street Tunnel
missions.shortDescription: Head to the iconic Krog Street Tunnel, known for its street art.
missions.hint: Look for the colorful tunnel that connects Inman Park to Cabbagetown.

missions.title: Springvale Park
missions.shortDescription: Take a relaxing break at Springvale Park, a neighborhood gem.
missions.hint: This park features a serene pond and plenty of shade from tall trees.

missions.title: King of Pops Window
missions.shortDescription: Finish your adventure with a treat at the King of Pops Window.
missions.hint: Look for a small, colorful stand offering refreshing popsicles.
